    About me

    • I am a Ph.D. student in CCVL group at Johns Hopkins University, advised by Prof. Alan Yuille.

    • I received my master’s degree at ETH Zürich, advised by Prof. Luc Van Gool.

    • I received my B.E. degree from Wuhan University in 2019 (ranking 1st in EE).
      My undergraduate research advisor is Prof. Jiayi Ma.

    Recent News

    • Jan 16, 2024. A paper was accepted by ICLR 2024 as spotlight (5%).
    • May 20, 2023. We are organizing the 2nd OOD-CV workshop at ICCV 2023.
    • Jul 03, 2022. A paper was accepted by ECCV 2022.
    • Jun 30, 2022. We are organizing the Out Of Distribution Generalization in Computer Vision (OOD-CV) workshop at ECCV 2022, including both a challenge track and a paper track. Welcome to participate!
